traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The terracotta warrior is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the terracotta warrior must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of terracotta warrior.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The terracotta warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.
